values: 检查；核对；核实；制止；控制；阻止；勾选；标记；对账；（在国际象棋中）将军；（因发现问题而）停止；暂停；（在扑克牌游戏中）不下赌注
检查；查看（是否安全、正确、状况良好）；制止；（尤指餐馆中的）账单；支票（同cheque）；（棋盘游戏中的一种使对方国王直接受到攻击的）棋步；（国际象棋中）被将军；（通常指双色的）方格图案；格子图案；格纹；裂痕；阻止恶化的事物
行了；好的；没问题；核对无误；注意；小心；（国际象棋中）将军

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 检查（check的过去式和过去分词）
检验员；收银员；棋子；方格图案；制止者
把…画成棋盘形方格图案；使多样化

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指抑制住强烈的感情或欲望。
多指阻止前进或继续发展。
常指暂时对某种行动或冲动的抑制。
可指急剧或果断的制止，也可指用严格的方法加以控制。
主要指抑制愿望、情绪或念头，也指制止某物的蔓延。
含义广，指用强力或权力去阻止或限制某人做某事。

word_group.brief_definition: 登记入住, 办理登机手续
检查, 检验, 结帐
试音, 音控台试音, 音控台试音常识
被控制住；被将军；王被将军
入场券；货到优先供应券；优待券
拼写检查；拼写检查软件

bilingual.target: 检查你学习英语的方法。
我只是需要检查一些东西。
检查学生是否理解故事。

bilingual.source: Listen and check the words you hear.
bilingual.target: 听并检查你听到的单词。
检查学生是否记住了这些意思。
用这些问题检查理解情况。

list.abstract: check（英 [tʃek]，美 [tʃek]），英语单词，作动词为检查；制止；控制。作名词为检查；阻挡；减缓。作惊叹词为行！对；将。短语搭配有check in（登记入住）。例句为“Check the words in a dictionary.（在字典里查这些单词。）”。 check不及物动词类近义词有examine、inspect等，相关反义词有disagree。形容词形式为checked，动词形式为check，名词形式为checker。
热血精灵Check（韩国，暗夜精灵，星际争霸2中使用虫族）。 姓名：Lee Hyung Ju 国籍：韩国 CHECK的名字可以追溯到很久以前ROC的时代，这个精灵族很原始的祖先就如同KOG一样，真的，显得稳健而有力。 CHECK2009成绩： G联赛第六赛季总决赛亚军 2009年IEF迷你中韩对抗赛冠军 2009年NGTV四大天王赛冠军

yingyinNormal.en: I can check that for you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要不要我检查一下？

yingyinNormal.en: Just double-check your seat belts, please.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请再次检查安全带是否系好。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll check the kitchen floors. Okay, knock yourself out, Larry.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我去检查厨房地板。请自便，赖瑞。

yingyinNormal.en: Steward, check the starboard corridor. Yes, Mr. Andrews.
yingyinNormal.zh: 斯图瓦特，检查右舷的通道。是，安德鲁先生。

yingyinNormal.en: Tickets, please. Mr Rabbit has come to check everyone's ticket.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请出示车票。兔先生已经要开始检查大家的票了。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, Mason, when I check the mobiles, am I gonna find yours? No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，梅森，我要检查作业了，我能检查你的吗？不能。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa, George, are you ready to go for your check up? I am too busy for a check up, I am having a tea party with Teddy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇，乔治，你们准备好去做检查吗？我今天没空去做检查，我和泰迪约好了一起去喝茶。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll check flights. I'll check hotels. I'll check my underpants. I'm so excited, I think I peed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我去查机票。我来查酒店。我去检查我的内裤，我激动到貌似都尿了。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll be back to check on Jane in a week. I look forward to it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一周后我再来给简检查。我很期待。

yingyinNormal.en: Check it. Make sure it's the right thing. I trust you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 检查一下吧，确认这就是你要的。我相信你。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll be back in an hour to check you again. Thank you. Thank you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一小时后再回来帮你检查。谢谢。

yingyinNormal.en: What a good idea, granny Pig. Now I just check on the boat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真是个好主意啊，猪奶奶。那我来检查一下船。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, this one is for one free grammar check. You could use it for emails, letters, tattoos, what have you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 比如这张，可提供一次免费的语法检查，我可以帮你检查电邮，信件，纹身等诸如此类的东西。

yingyinNormal.en: And always, always check the rigging yourself. Never step on a wire if you've not checked all of the rigging yourself. Capisce? Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 绝对要亲自检查钢索状况，如果没有亲自完整检查千万别踩上钢索，懂吗？懂。

yingyinNormal.en: Yummy. Larry? Oh yeah. I'd let him check out my kitchen floors.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真可口。你说赖瑞？我也愿意让他检查我厨房地板。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, I've never had a mole check. Well, it's been nice knowing you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还从来没检查过痣呢。此生能认识你真好。

yingyinNormal.en: And I told her, "I know he does them, 'cause I check them every night."
yingyinNormal.zh: 我和她说，我知道他有做，因为我每晚都有检查。

yingyinNormal.en: Then I'll dust. I did that, too. Then I'll check the batteries in the smoke detectors. Howard just did that. Yeah, let him do it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我去扫灰。我也做完了。那我去检查烟雾侦测器里的电池。霍华德刚检查完。没事，让他做吧。

yingyinNormal.en: And while I'm there, I may as well get a flu shot and a mole check. Sure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 既然都去了，不如把流感疫苗也打了再检查下痣。好啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, Leonard, good. There you are. I need you to check my head for chair lice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱纳德，很好。找到你了，我需要你来检查我头上有没有虱子。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 检查; 核实; 核对
控制; 抑制; 制止
(check in)登记; 报到; 托运

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 未受约束的；未受控制的；未经检查的；未经核对的

word_family.mean: v. 检查；制止；控制；将军；不下赌注；暂停以确认气味或重新嗅得气味

sense_info_list.en: an examination of something in order to make certain that it is correct or the way it should be
sense_info_list.zh: 检查; 核实; 核对

examination_example.sentence: Are there inspectors to <highlight>check</highlight> that people have paid?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是否有检查员检查人们是否已经付款？

examination_example.sentence: Most Americans rely on social media to <highlight>check</highlight> daily headlines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数美国人依靠社交媒体查看每日头条。

examination_example.sentence: Passengers must pay $85 every five years to process their background <highlight>checks</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 乘客必须每五年支付85美元来处理他们的背景调查。

sense_info_list.en: a written order to a bank to pay a stated sum from the drawer's account

examination_example.sentence: It takes several days before a <highlight>check</highlight> is cashed and funds are withdrawn from the issuer's account.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 支票兑现和资金从发行人账户中提取需要几天时间。

examination_example.sentence: Paper <highlight>checks</highlight> have the advantage that they provide receipts, something that many consumers are unwilling to give up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 纸质支票的优点是提供收据，这是许多消费者不愿放弃的。

examination_example.sentence: Another factor may be that more people are trying to overpack their carry-on bags to avoid <highlight>checked</highlight>-baggage fees.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一个因素可能是，越来越多的人试图超额打包他们的随身行李，以避免托运行李费用。

sense_info_list.en: a stopping or slowing of progress; a means of control or restraint
sense_info_list.zh: 控制; 抑制; 制止

examination_example.sentence: The marshals sent from Paris to try to keep them in <highlight>check</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从巴黎派来试图控制他们的法警。

sense_info_list.en: a mark (✓) that shows that something is correct or has been done

sense_info_list.zh: (check in)登记; 报到; 托运

sense_info_list.en: the bill in a restaurant or others
a pattern of squares formed by lines of different colors crossing each other

exam_freq_info.chinese: 行李标签; 行李牌; 寄存; 托运行李

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 登记入住；办理登机手续

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 未受约束的；未受控制的；未经检查的；未经核对的

word_family.mean: v. 检查；制止；控制；将军；不下赌注；暂停以确认气味或重新嗅得气味

sense_info_list.en: an examination of something in order to make certain that it is correct or the way it should be

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Check</highlight> if their children have enjoyed it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看看他们的孩子是否喜欢。

examination_example.sentence: You've also got color, texture and shape sensors looking down at the ground to <highlight>check</highlight> pasture quality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 还有颜色、纹理和形状传感器，通过看地面的情况就能检查草场质量。

examination_example.sentence: 80% of students use their phones or laptops during class, with the average student <highlight>checking</highlight> digital devices 11 times in a typical class.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 80%的学生在课堂上使用他们的手机或笔记本电脑，平均每个学生在一堂课上查看他们的数字设备11次。

sense_info_list.en: a written order to a bank to pay a stated sum from the drawer's account

examination_example.sentence: Fifteen years ago, Burberry was at crisis point as their signature <highlight>check</highlight> pattern was widely imitated by cheap, imitation brands.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 15年前，巴宝莉(Burberry)正处于危机时刻，因为他们的签名支票模式被廉价的仿制品牌广泛模仿。

examination_example.sentence: In the year 2004, at the height of over-exposure of the Burberry <highlight>check</highlight>, the brand's turnover was £715.5 million.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2004年，在Burberry支票过度曝光的高峰期，该品牌的营业额为7.155亿英镑。

sense_info_list.en: a stopping or slowing of progress; a means of control or restraint
a token of identification for left luggage
sense_info_list.zh: 行李标签; 行李牌; 寄存; 托运行李

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 含义与 block 很接近, 指阻塞通道或禁止出入, 但有对暗示不用障碍物的阻止或禁止。
语气强烈, 指有效堵住了通道, 使人或物无法通过。
指抑制住强烈的感情或欲望。
多指阻止前进或继续发展。
可指急剧或果断的制止, 也可指用严格的方法加以控制。
侧重因受到约束或阻碍而造成的行动困难。
语气较轻, 多指阻碍、拖延人或事, 强调使进展速度缓慢下来。
主要指抑制愿望、情绪或念头, 也指制止某物的蔓延。
正式用词, 语气强, 多指以干扰或设置障碍的方式阻碍交通, 使不能自由畅通。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 检查；制止；控制；将军；不下赌注；暂停以确认气味或重新嗅得气味

sense_info_list.en: an examination of something in order to make certain that it is correct or the way it should be

examination_example.sentence: All this is extra work we load onto ourselves because we don't trust people—the <highlight>checking</highlight>, following through, doing things ourselves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有这些额外工作都是我们自找的，因为我们不信任别人——我们检查、跟进、亲力亲为。

examination_example.sentence: A Pearson spokesperson told BuzzFeed News that "digital materials are less expensive and a good investment" that offer new features, like audio texts, personalized knowledge <highlight>checks</highlight> and expert videos.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 皮尔森(Pearson)公司的一位发言人对 BuzzFeedNews 说：“数字教材价格较低，是一项很好的投资。”它提供了新功能，例如音频文本，个性化知识检查和专家视频。

examination_example.sentence: Daffner suggests going to your doctor to <highlight>check</highlight> on medications, health problems and other issues that could be affecting memory.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 达夫纳建议去看医生，检查药物、健康问题和其他可能影响记忆的问题。

sense_info_list.en: a written order to a bank to pay a stated sum from the drawer's account

examination_example.sentence: A waiter has returned a <highlight>check</highlight> worth nearly $424,000 to the retired social worker who lost it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一名服务员将一张价值近42.4万美元的支票退还给了丢失支票的退休社会工作者。

examination_example.sentence: What did the customer try to do when she got her <highlight>check</highlight> back?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当这位顾客拿回她的支票后，她想做什么？

examination_example.sentence: It can be hard to identify which parcels are carrying crucial items such as Social Security <highlight>checks</highlight>, but USPS and UPS try their best to prioritize sensitive ma trial.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很难确定哪些包裹中携带着社会保险支票等重要物品，但美国邮政和联合包裹服务公司会尽最大努力优先处理敏感包裹。

sense_info_list.en: a stopping or slowing of progress; a means of control or restraint

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 含义与 block 很接近，指阻塞通道或禁止出入，但有对暗示不用障碍物的阻止或禁止。
语气强烈，指有效堵住了通道，使人或物无法通过。
指抑制住强烈的感情或欲望。
多指阻止前进或继续发展。
可指急剧或果断的制止，也可指用严格的方法加以控制。
侧重因受到约束或阻碍而造成的行动困难。
语气较轻，多指阻碍、拖延人或事，强调使进展速度缓慢下来。
主要指抑制愿望、情绪或念头，也指制止某物的蔓延。
正式用词，语气强，多指以干扰或设置障碍的方式阻碍交通，使不能自由畅通。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 登记入住；办理登机手续

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 检查站；关卡；计时处；检查点

word_family.mean: v. 检查；制止；控制；将军；不下赌注；暂停以确认气味或重新嗅得气味

examination_example.sentence: When you come across such words, <highlight>check</highlight> a dictionary to confirm their exact pronunciations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你遇到这样的单词时，查字典确认它们的准确发音。

examination_example.sentence: Now I can <highlight>check</highlight> one more thing off my list.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在我可以从清单上再检查一件事了。

examination_example.sentence: Did you <highlight>check</highlight> the balcony?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你检查过阳台了吗？

exam_freq_info.chinese: 检查; 核对; 确定

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 登记入住；办理登机手续

sense_info_list.en: an examination of something in order to make certain that it is correct or the way it should be
sense_info_list.zh: 检查; 核对; 确定

examination_example.sentence: Above all, you should often have doctor <highlight>check</highlight> your eyesight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先，你应该经常让医生检查你的视力。

examination_example.sentence: Cathy <highlight>checked</highlight> her paper carefully enough so that she could get good grades this time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 凯茜非常仔细地检查了她的试卷，以便她这次能取得好成绩。

examination_example.sentence: The teacher can <highlight>check</highlight> the homework anywhere at any time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 老师可以随时随地检查作业。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Check</highlight> it out here!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看看这里！

examination_example.sentence: Visitors to the UK can <highlight>check</highlight> it out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去英国的游客可以去看看。

examination_example.sentence: Alibaba opened a hotel in which a series of tasks such as <highlight>check</highlight>-in, light control and room service can be done by AI and robots.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阿里巴巴开了一家酒店，在这里，入住、灯光控制、客房服务等一系列任务都可以通过人工智能和机器人来完成。

sense_info_list.en: a mark (✓) that shows that something is correct or has been done

examination_example.sentence: It might be helpful when you get used to making a to-do list of all your schoolwork and <highlight>checking</highlight> each item off when it is completed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你习惯于把你所有的功课列成待办事项清单，并在完成后核对每一项时，这可能会有所帮助。

examination_example.sentence: As you complete each task, <highlight>check</highlight> it off.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你完成每项任务时，检查一下它。

examination_example.sentence: What time should we <highlight>check</highlight> out?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们应该什么时候结账离开？

sense_info_list.en: a written order to a bank to pay a stated sum from the drawer's account

examination_example.sentence: Do you know how to <highlight>check</highlight> out a book?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你知道如何借书吗？

sense_info_list.en: the bill in a restaurant or others
